skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Seasoned backend developer with nearly 5 years of experience adept in integrating databases, proficient in Java Spring Boot, Python Flask and Django, and Node.js.

skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Skilled in front-end development with React.js, specializing in responsive design and user-centric experiences.

skills.title: API Design
skills.description: Experienced in API and system design with a strong interest, backed by 5 years of expertise in crafting scalable and efficient solutions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A dynamic portfolio project showcasing my skills, built with React.js and hosted on Netlify for seamless accessibility.

portfolio.title: Dojo Blog
portfolio.description: A full-stack blog project leveraging React.js for the front end, with ongoing development of the Python Django back end for enhanced functionality and interactivity.

portfolio.title: Movie Review Application
portfolio.description: A full-stack movie review application featuring a Java 17 Spring Boot backend with MySQL database, while the front end is under development using React.js and Redux for seamless user experience.
